Spike in murdered women in Australia sparks outrage, highlights New Zealand’s own problems - The Front Page https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/spike-in-murdered-women-in-australia-sparks-outrage-highlights-new-zeallands-own-problems-the-front-page/RHV7DDLPN5CJPLQR76TJXFFKWA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/spike-in-murdered-women-in-australia-sparks-outrage-highlights-new-zeallands-own-problems-the-front-page/RHV7DDLPN5CJPLQR76TJXFFKWA/ Chelsea DanielsAustralian women have protested over a rise in murdered females across the country. Australians turned out in large numbers to call for an end to gender-based violence. Photo / Getty Images

Plan Change 33: Panel recommends against Mount Maunganui North 22m limithttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/plan-change-33-panel-recommends-against-mount-maunganui-north-22m-limit/NO4EJMOVIVCFNM2Z4F7IB6J7VM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/plan-change-33-panel-recommends-against-mount-maunganui-north-22m-limit/NO4EJMOVIVCFNM2Z4F7IB6J7VM/ Megan WilsonA decision will be made by Tauranga City Council commissioners on May 20. Photo / Mead Norton
Uru Taha gang boss Anthony Heke jailed for bashing over stolen money claim https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/uru-taha-gang-boss-anthony-heke-jailed-for-brutal-bashing-over-claim-of-stolen-money/6HXTFYNU7FA5VLY53F4QSS6T4U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/uru-taha-gang-boss-anthony-heke-jailed-for-brutal-bashing-over-claim-of-stolen-money/6HXTFYNU7FA5VLY53F4QSS6T4U/ Tara ShaskeyThe victim was on his couch when three gang members walked into his home and attacked him. Sun, 05 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Uru Taha gang president Anthony Joel Heke was sentenced in New Plymouth District Court to five years and three months for bashing an associate.
Hamilton hydrofoil bike maker Manta5 up for urgent sale https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/hamilton-Hydrofoil-bike-maker-manta5-up-for-urgent-sale/SEFBLXVXEBDW5OVKA2CJRNACQQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/hamilton-Hydrofoil-bike-maker-manta5-up-for-urgent-sale/SEFBLXVXEBDW5OVKA2CJRNACQQ/ Chris KeallTorpedo7 founders' startup takes a spill. Sun, 05 May 2024 21:07:14 +0000 Hayden Reeves recently become the first man to ride a Manta5 Hydrofoil Bike across the 26km Cook Strait. Unlike an e-bike on land, you can't stop pedalling for a breather whenever you want. Gliding requires a flat sea. If there are waves, it's a case of keep pedalling, or go for a paddle. Video still / Supplied
